learning_outcomes.description: Demonstrate a knowledge of the international monetary system and an ability to calculate and interpret values to various exchange rate problems.
Outline and apply theories of international finance which are used by firms to forecast exchange rates.
Explain foreign exchange exposure and compare instruments and techniques available to manage it.
Apply theories of international finance to case studies so as to analyse and evaluate and then articulate solutions to real world problems.
Compare costs and sources of capital of international and domestic firms.

assessments.task_description: This is an individual assignment.The project requires students to make a variety of international financial decisions. These may include calculations involving foreign exchange rates and discussions on contemporary issues related to the international monetary system, such as cryptocurrencies, exchange rate regimes, inflation, and other relevant topics.Submission Guidelines:Please ensure that yourfull name and student number appear on every pageof your assignment by inserting a header.Your document must be submitted inPDF format, typed inTimes New Roman,font size 12, anddouble-spacedwith2.54 cm marginson all sides.Each question should begin on a new page.References must be placed at the end of each question, not at the end of the document. Ensure proper and consistent referencing for each response.Use eitherAPA or Harvard referencing style.As a guide for word count, use amaximum of 150 words per mark. For example, for a 2-mark question, the maximum is 300 words.AI Statement:Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Translation (MT) are emerging tools that may support students in completing this assessment task.
